0.9.9.name: wordpress/ecycler
0.9.9.description:
This WordPress plugin adds a sidebar widget to display your ecycler (http://ecycler.com/) badge. In addition to the sidebar widget, the ecycler badge may also be displayed on your posts or pages using a shortcode.

Collectors: Use this widget to promote your ecycler business in conjunction with your marketing posters.

Discarders: Use this widget to show your pledge to recycle. Ecycler is a new way to recycle.

OPTIONAL: In order to maximize the power of this widget, you will need to register at http://ecycler.com/signup.php
